pkgmetadata.longdescription: Profiling API for adding external tool instrumentation support to any project. This was motivated by the need to quickly add instrumentation to the ADIOS2 library without adding a build dependency, or tying to a specific measurement tool. The initial prototype implementation was tied to TAU, but evolved to this more generic version, which was extracted as a separate repository for testing and demonstration purposes.
